section.title: &M-TD;
section.para: In reality, the &M-TD; is implemented over several databases. There is a system-wide cache, which should be protected so that only trusted users can regenerate it. When a &D-kit; is tailored, probe information is cached in the &D-kit; directory. Finally, a &D-tailor; may manually enter information into a configuration file in a &D-kit; to provide values to &qmconfig;.
